extension.description:
Important

To use this module, please follow the steps bellow:

Step1: Go to this link and click on - https://developers.facebook.com/apps

2) After registering, fill in App name, e.g. "_domain name_ App", description, e.g "My Twitter App", and write the address of your website. Check "I agree" next to their terms of service. Then go to setting select application Type Access: Read and Write. Then click on Update this Twitter application's settings. Then go to Details option and click "create your Twitter application
1. Click on create New App
2. Write Your App Name
3. Fill the captcha
4. just create App than you find the App id and the secret key"

Go to this link and click on - https://developers.facebook.com/tools/explorer Firstly you click on Graph API EXPLORER and see the dropdown list of your created apps select your app on which you want access token

Check the application here and Get Access Token. NOTE*:- select your created application. And click on rsvp_event , read_stream , create_event. After that click on the Get Access Token
